Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class ClientHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.ClientHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
EchoStub
public class ClientHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
Handler of the client. It converts all the messages from client in actions on the controller.

  • Method Details

    • send

      public void send​(MessageToClient message)
      Sends the object to the client
      Parameters:
      message - specific message MessageToClient.

    • sendError

      public void sendError​(ErrorMessage error)
      Sends an error message to the client.
      Parameters:
      error - specified error message to be sent

    • closeSocket

      private void closeSocket()
      close the connection with the client.

    • login

      private boolean login()
      login process.
      Returns:
      true if the login process ends with success.

    • requireMode

      private int requireMode() throws CrashException
      requires the game mode to the client
      Returns:
      integer representing the number of the players that will play at the game creation.
      Throws:
      CrashException - if a player crashes during the mode request.

    • run

      public void run()
      reads and parses the messages from the client and communicates with the controller when needed.
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable

    • setMyTurn

      public void setMyTurn​(boolean myTurn)
      Parameters:
      myTurn - true if it's the turn of the client, otherwise false.

    • setController

      public void setController​(Controller controller)
      links the client to the current game
      Parameters:
      controller - specified controller which points to the game played by this client.

    • getController

      public Controller getController()
      returns the controller linked with this client.
      Returns:
      the controller linked with this client.

    • isInGame

      public boolean isInGame()
      Returns:
      true if the player is online, otherwise false.

    • getNickname

      public java.lang.String getNickname()
      gives the nickname associated with this client.
      Returns:
      the nickname associated with this client.

    • setSocketTimeOut

      public void setSocketTimeOut​(int time) throws java.net.SocketException
      sets the timer to this socket
      Parameters:
      time - specified time after which the socket will rise an exception if there is no message from the client.
      Throws:
      java.net.SocketException - if there is no such socket.

    • awakeController

      private void awakeController()
      notify the controller that at least one player is online.

    • endConnection

      public void endConnection​(GameEnded points)
      sends the results of the game to the client. closes the socket and removes the nickname from the server's nickname list: when a player will retry to join with the nickname used by this client, he will join a new game.
      Parameters:
      points - specified message with the information about the end of the game.

    • handleCrash

      private void handleCrash()
      closes the socket of this player. If the player has crashed during his turn, it autocompletes his turn.
